snippet.title: Amber Heard poses with crutches after sustaining 'a broken bone'  | ABS US  DAILY NEWS
snippet.description:
★More ABS NEWS - Entertainment Video►► 
 She was recently spotted after a 'flirty' date with Sean Penn.But things quickly took a turn for the worse for Amber Heard, 31, who took to Instagram on Thursday to let fans know she had sustained 'a broken bone'.But the Justice League actress seemed in high spirits despite her misfortune, happily posing with friends - and her crutch. The Machete Kills actress posted a selfie to Instagram that she took inside the hospital while having scans for the fracture.In the picture, Heard poses with a crutch while wearing a fedora and flashing one shapely pin from under her hospital gown.   She captioned the post 'Crutching MRI-chic'.In another pic the All The Boys Love Mandy Lane poses with friends and her crutch.This image is captioned: 'Note: never let a broken bone get in the way of good dinner party.'   She reportedly enjoyed a 'flirty' date with actor Sean Penn at the Sunset Tower Bar in Los Angeles on Saturday.And Amber  looked deep in thought when she was pictured at the Silverlake Farmers' Market the morning after.Sporting tousled hair, it was the first sighting of the actress since she shared a bottle of red with Madonna's ex. The Drive Angry starlet looked incredible in her casual get-up on Sunday, wearing a tan colored cropped suede jacket and cropped jeans.She wore one of her trademark cowboy hats and hid her eyes behind a pair of round-lens sunglasses.Completing her look with a pair of black Alias Mae ankle boots, the ex-wife of Johnny Depp also carried a small black leather bag on one shoulder.
